author: julianfoad
msg: Correct two doc strings and rename a local type for clarity.
(svn_client_diff3): Remove an obsolete restriction from the doc string.
(struct diff_repos_repos): Rename to diff_repos_repos_t, to differentiate
it from the function of the same name.
(svn_client_diff3): Remove obsolete comments from the doc string.

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix a bug whereby a base->repos diff of a moved file gave the wrong output.
(Subversion failed to notice the move and gave an all-lines-deleted diff.)
(diff_repos_wc): Swap the two paths if we're diffing in reverse.
(svn_cl__diff): Do a "pegged" diff if either revision is non-local, not just
if the start revision is non-local.

author: malcolm
msg: Document the 'disown' argument for svn_stream_from_aprfile2().  Document
deprecated function svn_stream_from_aprfile() in terms of

author: ivan
msg: Calculate checksum during creating text-delta, instead of separate call
to svn_io_file_checksum(). This eliminates one read of whole file.
svn_txdelta(). Remove call to svn_io_file_checksum(). Don't disown
local stream to close file in correct order.
